Software Ideas Modeler is a tool for software modeling using UML diagrams.
If you like this program, support it by clicking the button "donate" and send any amount of money.
Don't use shortcut keys with CTRL-ALT
Download automatically new full setup file and install (Windows only)
Fast auto update - download and apply only changes
If you want to use Software Ideas Modeler for commercial purposes, you have to register and pay registration fee.
Wait for activation key, which will be sent to your e-mail.
Type activation key in the text box below and confirm it by clicking on the button Activate.
Activation was successfull. This copy of Software Ideas Modeler can be used commercially.
Thank you for using Software Ideas Modeler!
If you like this software and want to support its development, you have these options:
This copy of Software Ideas Modeler can be legaly used in commercial projects only after activation. You can get an activation key choosing this option.
After purchasing your bug reports and requirements will have higher priority. This dialog will not display on application exit.
If you are non-commercial user, you can use this application for free. Optionally, you can donate to this project by sending any amount of money.
After donating you will be listed in the list of donors on the web site. (If you don't want to be published in this list, please, let me know in message.)

If you don't have money to support this project financially you can support it in other ways: become a fan on Facebook, add link from your web site to this project, write about this software on your blog, or talk about it with others...

Software Ideas Modeler is freeware for non-commercial users (schools, non-profit organizations). Nevertheless, you may want to support this project financially and donate. Except a good feeling, you will become an official supporter of this project and get the advantages over other users:
1. Window with appeal to donate/purchase will not be shown after closing application.
2. Your bug reports and requirements will have higher priority than that ones from other users.
The donation page will be displayed after clicking on the Donate Now button. Any donation (just a few dollars/euros) is welcome.
Within two working days (usualy sooner) you receive the e-mail with donor key.
Confirm donor key and get advantages as an official supporter of this project.
Donor key is valid. You are becoming official supporter of this project. Thank you for your support!
10 days evaluation period expired. Now, if you want to continue to use this software, you have to buy a activation key. The activation key costs only €69 / $89.
After purchasing you get these benefits:
Higher priority for your reports and requests
